item.title: 印度农作物将在季风剩余时间里迎来更多降雨
item.description: 印度重要季风期剩余时间的降雨量预计将高于季节平均水平，有助于农民提高大米和大豆的产量。【原文：Rainfall over the remainder of India’s vital monsoon period is expected to be above the seasonal average, helping efforts by farmers to boost production of rice to soybeans.】

item.title: 南非将在年底前公布拟议的新财务规则
item.description: 南非国家财政部表示，期待已久的国家金融市场法规修改即将完成，并计划在年底前公布修改建议，征求意见。【原文：South Africa’s National Treasury said it is close to finalizing long-awaited changes to the nation’s financial markets regulations, and plans to publish proposed amendments for comment by the end of the year.】

item.title: 贝伦贝格称 BBVA 将在收购萨瓦德尔时裁员 3,700 人
item.description: 贝伦贝格公司（Berenberg）分析师迈克尔-克里斯托多鲁（Michael Christodoulou）认为，BBVA 在接管萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）后，如果想实现关键的节约目标，将需要裁员 3700 人。【原文：BBVA would need to eliminate 3,700 jobs after taking over Banco Sabadell SA if it wants to hit a key savings target, according to Berenberg analyst Michael Christodoulou.】

item.title: 首席执行官们在盈利电话会议上讨论美联储问题的速度创下新高
item.description: 对于试图把握降息时机的全球投资者来说，美联储是本周的热门话题。美联储也是美国企业财报后电话会议的一个重要议题。【原文：The Federal Reserve is a hot topic this week for global investors trying to time interest-rate cuts. It’s also — unusually — a prominent feature on Corporate America’s post-earnings conference calls.】

item.title: 挪威信贷增长速度一年来首次加快
item.description: 挪威的国内借贷在6月份出现了14个月以来的首次加速，这使得有迹象表明，挪威央行可能难以缓解这个能源丰富的北欧经济体的通胀压力。【原文：Norway’s domestic borrowing accelerated in June for the first time in 14 months, adding to signs that the central bank may struggle to ease inflationary pressures in the energy-rich Nordic economy.】

item.description: 在一家主要的锂生产商表示将关闭其在澳大利亚的一半加工能力之后，澳大利亚可能会提前实施针对关键矿物提炼的税收优惠计划。【原文：Australia may bring forward planned tax incentives for critical minerals refining after a major lithium producer said it would be shutting half of its processing capacity in the country.】

item.title: 外国投资者抛售日本股票创 10 个月之最
item.description: 外国投资者连续第二周抛售日本股票，创下自去年 9 月以来的最高纪录，原因是日元走强对市场构成压力，以及全球轮动撤出科技股导致科技股下滑。【原文：Foreign investors offloaded Japanese equities for a second week, the most since last September, as the stronger yen weighed on the market and as tech shares slumped amid global rotation out of the sector.】

item.title: 飞机停飞导致利润减少，威兹航空股价下跌
item.description: 威兹航空控股公司（Wizz Air Holdings Plc）下调了今年的利润预期，使该公司股价出现了自大流行病以来的最大跌幅，因为这家廉价航空公司正在努力解决夏季旅游旺季飞机停飞的问题。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc cut its profit forecast for this year, sending the shares to their biggest loss since the pandemic as the budget airline grapples with aircraft groundings during the busy summer travel season.】

item.title: 汽车业和法国兴业银行业绩黯淡，欧洲股市走低
item.description: 在汽车行业和法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）发布了一系列令人失望的财报之后，欧洲股市出现回落。这使得美联储可能在下个月降息的迹象黯然失色。【原文：European stocks retreated following a slate of disappointing earnings from the autos sector and Societe Generale SA. That took the shine off signs that the Federal Reserve could cut interest rates next month.】

item.description: 壳牌公司（Shell Plc）公布的第二季度盈利超出预期，并确认将再回购 35 亿美元的股票。【原文：Shell Plc reported second-quarter earnings that beat estimates and confirmed another $3.5 billion of share buybacks.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯上调指导性目标，成本控制有助于盈利
item.description: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯控股公司（Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc）上调了利润指导，并表示将自大流行病以来首次恢复派息，因为这家飞机发动机制造商受益于更严格的成本控制和对大型喷气涡轮机的需求。该股股价飙升至创纪录水平。【原文：Rolls-Royce Holdings Plc raised its profit guidance and said it will reinstate dividend payments for the first time since the pandemic as the manufacturer of aircraft engines benefits from greater cost discipline and demand for large jet turbines. The stock surged to a record.】

item.title: 暴雨迫使本地销售，中国将储备更多小麦
item.description: 在暴雨迫使一些农民将他们的小麦卸载到粮食已经堆积如山的市场上之后，中国正在加强国家对小麦的采购，以支持当地的小麦价格。【原文：China is stepping up state purchases of wheat to support local prices, after heavy rains forced some farmers to unload their crop into a market already heaving with grain.】

item.title: 英国全国房价连续第三个月上涨
item.description: 据一家顶级抵押贷款机构称，英国房价连续第三个月上涨，进一步证明在借贷成本达到 16 年来最高水平的情况下，英国市场正在趋于稳定。【原文：UK house prices rose for a third month, adding to evidence the market is stabilizing in the face of the highest borrowing costs in 16 years, according to one of the top mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 主要中国市场需求减弱导致宝马盈利下降
item.description: 宝马汽车公司第二季度盈利下降，原因是其主要市场中国的销售额下降，这家德国公司加入了越来越多的汽车制造商的行列，与需求放缓作斗争。【原文：BMW AG earnings declined in the second quarter on waning sales in its key market China, where the German company joins a growing list of automakers struggling with a demand slowdown.】

item.title: 日本贸易公司认为加息有利于业务发展
item.description: 日本贸易公司在发布季度业绩时表示，央行的加息决定对其国内业务是积极的，因为这预示着经济的改善。【原文：Japanese trading houses said the central bank’s decision to raise interest rates is positive for their domestic businesses because it signals improvement in the economy, as they released quarterly results.】

item.title: ING上调收入预期，利润超出预期

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔就中国钢铁出口发难

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入再次低于预期，原因是对打击博彩业的担忧
item.description: 7月份澳门博彩业收入增长依然疲软，未能达到分析师的预期，这表明中国政府对非法汇兑活动和跨境赌博的打击削弱了玩家的情绪。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue growth remained sluggish in July, failing to meet analysts’ expectation in a sign that Beijing’s crackdown on illegal money exchange activities and cross-border gambling has dented sentiment among players.】
